testimonials.title: What Creators Are Saying

creator1.name: Sarah Mitchell
creator1.quote: Climbley helped me finally get consistent with my content. I went from posting randomly to having a clear plan every week!

creator2.name: Marcus Johnson
creator2.quote: The niche finder was eye-opening. I discovered a content angle I never considered, and my engagement tripled!

creator3.name: Emily Chen
creator3.quote: As a coach, trainer, and producer all in one? That's exactly what Climbley is. It's like having a content team in your pocket.

quiz.title: Find Your Creator Niche
quiz.description: Answer these questions to receive personalized YouTube growth strategies
quiz.selectionLimitDesc: You can only select up to {max} options
quiz.authRequiredDesc: Please sign in to take the quiz
quiz.question: Question

Q1_content_mode.text: Which style of creating sounds most like you?

options.Q1A1: Teaching and explaining step by step
options.Q1A2: Entertaining with humor, skits, or performance
options.Q1A4: Reviewing or analyzing products and trends
options.Q1A5: Documenting my progress and lessons learned

Q2_passions.text: Pick up to 3 topics you could talk about for hours.

Q3_strengths.text: Which strengths feel most true? (Pick up to 2)

options.Q4A4: Share opinions and reviews people trust

Q6_time.text: Realistic time you can dedicate weekly?

Q7_resources.text: What gear/resources do you have today?

Q8_audience.text: Who do you most want to reach?
